name: Garbage Girl Louise
storyline:
Our Story Starts November of 1986...
Minister Mole, leader of the evil Mole Cult, has hatched a plan across the Urbanian Republic to capture every raccoon his moles can find! But when they kidnap Louise and Eisel's pet, Rocky, the two garbage girls set out on an adventure to rescue all their ring-tailed friends and clean up the garbage the moles left behind. What does the Mole Cult plan to do with so many trapped raccoons? Who will Louise encounter on her way to Rocky? What macguffins will we chase? Will there be romance? Betrayal? AUTOSCROLLERS? Stay tuned and find out!
summary: Garbage Girl Louise is an indie platformer about breaking down boxes, cleaning up streets, and taking names! Of course, this is done through bouncing on evil moles, magic trash cans, and cardboard boxes, all while tossing anything you can get your grubby trash girl hands on! Save trapped raccoons, meet weirdos around the city, and even race against your ex-girlfriend! Dingy streets! Bubble wrap! Magical eggs! Lesbians! Yeah, we have everything!
